mosinstall.name: VirtueMart Module
mosinstall.author: The VirtueMart Development Team
mosinstall.copyright: Copyright (C) 2004-2008 Soeren Eberhardt-Biermann. All rights reserved.
mosinstall.description: Shows VirtueMart categories, the shopping cart, a product search field, an administration link, an account maintenance link and a link to the download page.

param.name: class_sfx
param.label: Menu Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: pretext
param.label: Pre-text
param.description: This is the Text or HTML that is displayed above the category listing

param.name: show_login_form
param.label: Show a Login Form for the customers?
param.description: Defines wether a Login Module is displayed or not.

param.name: show_categories
param.label: Show the Product Categories?
param.description: Defines wether the Product Categories are displayed in the Module or not.

param.name: show_listall
param.label: Show List All - link?
param.description: Defines wether a link to list all products is displayed or not.

param.name: show_adminlink
param.label: Show Administrator Link?
param.description: Defines wether the administrator link is displayed under the product browser.

param.name: show_accountlink
param.label: Show Account Link?
param.description: Defines wether the account link is displayed under the product browser.

param.name: useGreyBox_accountlink
param.label: Open the Account Maintenance in a GreyBox?
param.description: GreyBox is a webpage UI dialog widget. It opens the page in a new inline-window and hides the other part of the website under a gray overlay.

param.name: show_minicart
param.label: Show Mini Cart?
param.description: Defines wether the mini cart with a link to the cart and the actual total $ is displayed or not.

param.name: useGreyBox_cartlink
param.label: Open the Cart in a GreyBox?
param.description: GreyBox is a webpage UI dialog widget. It opens the page in a new inline-window and hides the other part of the website under a gray overlay.

param.name: show_productsearch
param.label: Show Product Search Field?
param.description: Defines wether a product search field is displayed or not.

param.name: show_product_parameter_search
param.label: Show Product Parameter Search Field?
param.description: Shows a link to the Product Parameter Search Form (advanced search!).

param.name: menutype
param.label: Category display type
param.description: You can set the display type to *links* to have the default display type: a link list. If you set it to *dTree*, the categories will be displayed in a dTree structure.

param.name: jscook_type
param.label: JSCook Type
param.description: The Style for Displaying the categories: Menu or Tree

param.name: jscookMenu_style
param.label: JSCookMenu Style
param.description: The Style for the JSCookMenu. Only fill in when you have selected JSCookMenu as Display Style

param.name: menu_orientation
param.label: JSCookMenu Orientation
param.description: If you choose JSCookMenu: Either let it display horizontal or vertical!

param.name: jscookTree_style
param.label: JSCookTree Style
param.description: The Style for the JSCookTree. Only fill in when you have selected JSCookTree as Display Style

param.name: root_label
param.label: Label of the dTree Root
param.description: Whatever you fill in here: it will be displayed in the root of the dTree.
